DOC.brief_summary: Tinnitus may affect the ability of patients to detect emotions in spoken language. This study will compare this ability between tinnitus patients and non-tinnitus patients.
DOC.brief_title: Detection of Emotions in a Spoken Language Among Tinnitus Patients
DOC.criteria: Tinnitus lasting 3 months and longer Hebrew speakers Tinnitus which began less than 3 months ago Learned Hebrew after the age of 5
